Red Sea, China risks to US economy seem contained, White House saysThe United States risks some exposure to China's economic slowdown and shipping disruptions in the Red Sea, but they appear contained, President Joe Biden's top economic adviser said on Friday, adding that the U.S. economy is "upbeat." Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:54:00 GMT W2RA4JBBWFKSPL5PHC2WVMOWGU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/red-sea-china-risks-us-economy-seem-contained-white-house-says-2024-01-26/Trevor Hunnicutt世界美国
US House bill would curb genetic info sharing with China's Wuxi Apptec, BGIA congressional committee focused on China has introduced a bill that would restrict federally funded medical providers from allowing China's BGI Group, WuXi Apptec and other biotech companies from getting genetic information about Americans. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:24:44 GMT 77DDRMFAYFJP5J3CRC25LJIJEU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-house-bill-would-curb-genic-info-sharing-with-chinas-wuxi-apptec-bgi-2024-01-26/Karen Freifeld可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Electric car maker Polestar to cut around 450 jobs globallyElectric car maker Polestar Automotive Holding , plans to cut around 450 jobs globally, or about 15% of its workforce, amid "challenging market conditions", the Swedish company said on Friday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:32:44 GMT EPGRKVLAEFNL7DYSBGHHCLVLSQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/electric-vehicle-maker-polestar-cut-around-450-jobs-globally-2024-01-26/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China Evergrande unit starts legal proceedings against parentEvergrande Property Services said on Friday its units have started legal proceedings against parent China Evergrande to recover 11.4 billion yuan ($1.59 billion) of pledge guarantees on deposit certificates. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 13:05:43 GMT BFEI5NQA65LURMIS754YRJZRYQ https://www.reuters.com/business/china-evergrande-unit-starts-legal-proceedings-against-parent-2024-01-26/Reuters商业
Israel's Ashdod port sees strategic risk from China during Gaza warIsrael's government-run port of Ashdod has complained that a rival Chinese-run terminal at the northern port of Haifa has become a strategic risk during the Gaza war. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 12:45:30 GMT HVAJGYHQSJPLLCO3BYLJUSG6JQ https://www.reuters.com/world/israels-ashdod-port-sees-strategic-risk-china-during-gaza-war-2024-01-26/Ari Rabinovitch, Jonathan Saul世界
Ukraine invites China's Xi to 'peace summit' - Zelenskiy's top adviserUkraine has invited Chinese President Xi Jinping to participate in a planned "peace summit" of world leaders in Switzerland, a top diplomatic adviser to President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said, as Russia's invasion approaches its second anniversary. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 12:15:08 GMT ZKDXGZBEIVNNJMX6XDQ6ZHNLPA https://www.reuters.com/world/ukraine-invites-chinas-xi-peace-summit-zelenskiys-top-adviser-2024-01-26/Olena Harmash世界
